name: RacerTimes
tag_list: racing, cars, sponsorship, circuits, tickets, motorbikes, motorsports, automotive, auto, formula
overview:
RacerTimes provides online services for the motorsports and automotives market.

RacerTimes has three different products which help solve problems in motorsports.

product 1- RacerTimes Connect “social networking for motorsports and automotives world.

product 2- RacerTimes Drive ” Online ticket sales and registeration platform for race events and etc” - (to be launched by - mid november)

product 3- RacerTimes Pot “online Race Driver and Race Team social sponsorship platform” - (to be launched mid october or sooner)

website is undergoing major developments to make a more user friendly and benefitial enviornment in motorsports and beyond.
